Description:
Google Pay Integration Library

Version:
- See [version.txt](./version.txt) file.

Importing:
```
cd third_party/gpay
./import.sh
```

Local Modifications:
- `third_part/web_activities` are re-targetted to use SwG version of Web Activities.
